body: All sayain females are small by default with the newer style. And shes not a lesbian nor has she shown any interest.

OKAY SO UMH SHIT WENT FROM 100 TO 0 REAL FUCKIN QUICK

1) Caulifla's age isn't known. She looks like she's in her early-mid twenties. Pure Saiyans look chibi until they hit full maturity, and they also retain their youthful appearance until they're about 80. Considering that her brother Renzo looks a bit aged, and considering the doubt that she'd be decades younger than him, goes against the notion that she's a teen.

2) Whether or not Caulifla and/or Kale are actual lesbians, there is objectively no point where this is stated or even hinted. That's complete baseless supposition.

A 40 y/o man that can punch trough space and time and has about 5 transformation (does kaioken and ui count?) fucks a teenager that can also punch really hard and is technically lesbian (when is she ever going to date someone) and has a lesbian sister.... this is what this doujin is all about :/ (i watch dB don’t harass me saying that i hate db or some shit like that pls) have a good day !
